name: personal_independence_payments_agent
description: An agent that is an expert in evaluating the likelihood of success when applying for personal independence payments.

skills.name: PIP Likelihood Determination
skills.description: Walks a client through a process that allows the agent to determine how likely it is that the user would succeed if they were to apply for personal independence payments
examples: To answer a question like '1. Question 1', send JSON {"question_number": 1, "answer":"Answer provided by user"}
